statements: SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM purchases WHERE vendor = 'VendorA';
SELECT purchase_id, instrument_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT instrument_name, vendor, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE instrument_name LIKE 'Guitar%';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT instrument_name, vendor, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE vendor = 'Amazon' AND instrument_name LIKE 'Guitar%'
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, instrument_name FROM purchases GROUP BY instrument_name ORDER BY average_price DESC
SELECT purchase_id, price, vendor FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM purchases LIMIT 5;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM purchases WHERE vendor = 'Vendor 1';
SELECT purchase_date, instrument_name FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'Location 1';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, instrument_name, price FROM purchases WHERE vendor='ABC Corp' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT instrument_name FROM purchases WHERE vendor='XYZ Inc' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE vendor='PQR Ltd' ORDER BY purchase_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM purchases WHERE vendor='DEF Co' AND instrument_name LIKE '%guitar%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location='New York' AND vendor_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM purchases WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM purchases GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM purchases GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT i.instrument_name, v.vendor_name FROM purchases p LEFT JOIN instruments i ON p.instrument_name = i.instrument_name LEFT JOIN vendors v ON p.vendor_name = v.vendor_name;
SELECT DISTINCT vendor_name FROM purchases ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT vendor_name, instrument_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT purchase_date, instrument_name, vendor_name FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM instruments ORDER BY brand ASC, instrument_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM vendors;

SELECT p.purchase_id, p.instrument_name, i.brand, p.price, v.vendor_name FROM purchases p JOIN instruments i ON p.instrument_name = i.instrument_name JOIN vendors v ON p.vendor_name = v.vendor_name WHERE p.purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT i.instrument_name, i.type, COUNT(p.purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM instruments i LEFT JOIN purchases p ON i.instrument_name = p.instrument_name GROUP BY i.instrument_name, i.type ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, p.instrument_name, p.price, p.purchase_date FROM users u JOIN purchases p ON u.user_id = p.purchase_id WHERE u.last_login >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT v.vendor_name, v.contact_person, COUNT(p.purchase_id) AS total_purchases, SUM(p.price) AS total_revenue FROM vendors v LEFT JOIN purchases p ON v.vendor_name = p.vendor_name GROUP BY v.vendor_name, v.contact_person HAVING total_purchases > 5 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT p.purchase_id, p.instrument_name, p.price, v.vendor_name, v.email FROM purchases p JOIN vendors v ON p.vendor_name = v.vendor_name WHERE p.price > 10000;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_id DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, price FROM purchases WHERE vendor = 'Vendor A';
SELECT purchase_date, instrument_name FROM purchases WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE vendor = 'Vendor B' AND price < 500;
SELECT purchase_id, vendor, price FROM purchases ORDER BY vendor, price DESC, purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE vendor = 'Vendor A' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, instrument_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT instrument_name, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM purchases GROUP BY instrument_name ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM purchases WHERE instrument_name = 'Guitar';
